item.title: The owners want to close this Colorado coal plant. The Trump administration says no
item.description: The Trump administration has ordered several coal plants to keep operating past their planned retirement, part of a larger effort to boost the coal industry. Two Colorado utilities are pushing back.

item.title: Business owners are wondering if they'll get their money back after tariff ruling
item.description: We reached out to business owners who paid those Trump tariffs that have been struck down by the Supreme Court as unconstitutional. The question on their minds: will they get their money back? How will they get their money back?

item.title: Using saliva to detect disease holds promise, but it's not perfected yet
item.description: Easier than a blood test, saliva tests have the potential to detect cavities, infections and even cancer. But a lack of insurance coverage and other obstacles stand in the way of wider use.
